text: The 1959 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles was the 25th edition of the women's singles championship. Kimiyo Matsuzaki defeated Fujie Eguchi in the final by three sets to one, to win the title. ==Results== ==See also== List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== \- Category:1959 in women's table tennis Table
title: 1959 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles
